About Me

Let me tell you a few things about myself...

BIO

I am a data analyst and a data science lover with keen interest in artificial intelligence. My passion is to help researchers and business owners analyse their dataset.

I love utilising the power of the power of data visualization to create and engage reports and tell the story behind the data.

Exploring a dataset for me means to transform digit and strings into metrics and dimension needed to create easy-to-understand reports and dashboard but importantly, to answer the question at hand.

I am skilled in most of data science methodology; data collection and gathering, data preprocessing, exploratory data analysis and visualization and report communication.

I am currently a peer tutor (Python and Pandas) at AI Saturdays in Abeokuta and also a freelancer.

Coven Labs: A source of verve to pursue your data science career

While undergoing my youth Service at Owo local government of Ondo State, I found myself interested in the fourth industrial revolution skills and I embraced programming.
